channel.title: Projects on Max Redmond
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Max Redmond

item.title: Access System for HackRVA
item.description: This project includes electronic and hardware designs for RFID scanners, a web server, and database to handle requests from the reader and manage the users that need access.

item.title: tool scheduling calendar
item.description: tool-cal “is an open source tool that allows makerspaces to schedule tool use.” This application uses a javascript front end, a Go API layer, and uses Redis to store the events. It uses docker and docker-compose as adeployment mechanism.
